name: python-tools
description:
Features :
- HappyDoc opens the current module UML class schema : [CTRL]-h
- getPythonDoc finds the current class+method name : [CTRL]-j
- collapsePythonBlock folds a python block : [CTRL]-k
- putEmptyFunc writes a new commented func : [CTRL]-n

Goodies :
- Explorer under [F9]
- Terminal overflow highlighting (80columns)
install_details:
Requirements :
- vim with python interpreter enabled

For uml diagrams :
- happydoc (currently using 2.0)
- dia
